content.en: Power Harmonic Optimization: Researchers have explored various algorithms to address different research questions related to power harmonic estimation and optimization in distribution systems. These algorithms, such as M-Estimators, Seeker Optimization Algorithm, and Weighted Least Squares criterion, are used to perform tasks like harmonic estimation, optimal meter placement, and harmonic state estimation. By utilizing these algorithms, scientists aim to improve the accuracy and efficiency of power systems analysis and management.
content.da: Power Harmonic Optimization: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til effekt harmonisk estimering og optimering i distributionssystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom M-estimatorer, Seeker Optimization Algorithm og Weighted Least Squares kriterium, bruges til at udføre opgaver som harmonisk estimering, optimal placering af målere og harmonisk tilstandsvurdering. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af analyses og styring af kraftsystemer.
